page.title: 15Employment inside Fairford
page.content: Here is a list of the{occupations}of over half of the{fathers}of the children at the local Primary School. They all work{within Fairford}( for outside see Page 16 ). At Air Base 8, Farmers 7, Teachers 4, Builders 4, Electricians 3, Woodsman 3, Mechanic 3, Driver 2, Doctor 2, Caretaker 1, Roof Tiler 1, Director 1, Plumber 1, Storeman 1, Chartered Accountant 1, Factory Worker 1, Insurance 1, Decorator 1, Welder 1, Laboratory Technician 1, Dental Surgeon 1. {Mothers}were employed as follows: Cleaners 11, Nurse 9, Food Service Worker 6, Teacher 5, Shop Assistant 5, Secretary 4, Childminder 4, Clerk 3, Librarian 3, Hairdresser 3, Manager 2, Supervisor 1.
